title: Kinky Curly Curling Custard 16 oz
description:
CURLING CUSTARD gives moisture and curl definition, hold and brilliant shiny hair all in one product!
It reduces bulk, defines & elongates your curls helping them to 'hang' better. CURLING CUSTARD will bring out the natural curl or wave pattern you never knew you had!
It is an advanced botanical formula made with ALL NATURAL ingredients that nourish and strengthen the hair. Utilizing the humectant properties of the Agave Nectar, CURLING CUSTARD will give weight to your hair, define your curls, remove frizz, provide long lasting hold and shine without ever being greasy, crunchy or drying to your hair.
This high performance product is very concentrated so a little goes a long way.

title: GPB (Glycogen Protein Balance) Conditioner Jumbo Size - 16 oz - Liquid
description: For years, people have sworn by this ultra-nourishing conditioner made with two kinds of protein-lactalbumin (a milk protein) and glycogen from oyster shells. High in sulfur-rich amino acids and other nutrients, GPB is the solution to dry, chemically-treated hair and split ends. (Not a vegan product.)   INGREDIENTS: Essential Fatty Acid Base (with Amino Acids Cysteine, Cystine and Methionine), Lactalbumin (milk protein), Rosemary, Sage, Horsetail, Coltsfoot, Nettle, Glycogen (from oyster shells), Balsam Tolu, Aubrey's Preservative (Citrus Seed Extract, Vitamins A, C and E).

title: Mederma Stretch Marks Therapy, 5.29 Oz Box
description: Mederma Stretch Marks Therapy 5.29 OZ. Combines botanical ingredients and a premium skin hydrator in a nourishing formula that is clinically shown to improve the appearance of stretch marks. Noticeable improvement in just 4 weeks. Paraben free, dermatologist tested. Reduces discoloration, improves texture and enhances softness

title: Cricket Professional Friction Free Pick Comb
description: Proprietary blend of polymers to reduce friction caused by brushing and styling hair-creating a smooth finish. Bristles are ion infused with tourmaline to impart moisture into the hair shaft, reducing static electricity and creating incredible smooth shine. Attractive ergonomic design with non-slip grip. Ideal for lifting or fluffing to add volume.

title: Jane Carter Solution Wrap and Roll, 8 Oz.
description: Jane carter solution wrap and roll is the best soft mousse, setting and wrapping product available on the market today. It dries clean and soft without leaving and residue. Great for dry color-treated or damaged hair, the natural glycerides, essential oils and moisturizers leave your hair soft and shiny. Cut dryer time in half by applying wrap and roll liberally to wet hair, then wrap/set and dry as usual or let it dry naturally.
